recommended_degree: Manajemen, Manajemen Bisnis, Bisnis Manajemen Retail, Manajemen Retail, Manajemen Pemasaran (Sarjana)
job_description:
This position serves as a talent reserve for store management. Candidates must be willing to accept company assignments and have the potential to grow into store managers in the future.

Provide professional product explanations, answer customer inquiries, and enhance the shopping experience. Achieve individual sales targets and contribute to store performance growth. Maintain the store environment, ensure neat product displays, and create a positive shopping atmosphere. Handle daily store operations, including daily settlement, display management, and system operations.Address customer and team concerns, effectively manage complaints and feedback. Maintain company assets and ensure proper management of store equipment and inventory.

Placement : West Jakarta
